summary: I AM HAVING PROBLEMS WITH MY 2011 FORD EDGE WITH THE SAFETY LATCH -  AUTO DOOR LATCH WILL NOT ENGAGE,  KEEPS OPENING UP WHEN IN DRIVE ALONG WITH THE INTERIOR DOOR ADJAR LIGHT STAYING ON  -  THIS HAPPENS IN HOT WEATHER AS WELL AS COLD IN MINNESOTA  -  I CANNOT LOCK THE VEHICLE, AND DOOR LOCK KEEPS OPENING WHILE DRIVING CAUSING A SAFETY HAZARD
